title: Ice-Breaking
situation: 엘리베이터 안. 어색한 공기를 깨야 한다.
situation_en: Inside an elevator. Need to break the awkward silence.
goal_en: Throw out an 'interesting topic' instead of talking about the weather
sloane_line: Silence makes me nervous. Say something interesting.

title: Storytelling
situation: 라운지 바. 내 출신 성분(Underdog) 어필하기.
situation_en: Lounge bar. Need to appeal to your underdog background.
goal: 서울상경, 달동네, 여자혼자 남자 사업가들 키우기 -> 이 키워드를 '야망'으로 포장하기
goal_en: Seoul, poor neighborhood, woman raising male entrepreneurs -> Package these keywords as 'ambition'
sloane_line: Everyone loves a struggle story. But don't sound pathetic. Make it sound like a legend.

title: The Pitch
situation_en: Investor meeting. Explain your business model (revenue model).
goal: 구체적인 숫자와 확신에 찬 단어 쓰기
goal_en: Use specific numbers and confident words
sloane_line: I don't care about your dreams. I care about your margins. How do we make money?

title: Insider Talk
situation: 담배 타임 / 회식 자리. 은밀한 업계 뒷담화.
situation_en: Smoking break / dinner party. Secretive industry gossip.
goal: 투자자, 경쟁사 동향을 '고급지게' 까내리기 (Burn rate, Ghosted 등 사용)
goal_en: Critique investors and competitors' moves 'sophisticatedly' (use terms like Burn rate, Ghosted)
sloane_line: Now we are talking. Tell me what you really think about that VC firm. Keep it off the record.
